issue.title: [Doc][C++] Centralize documentation for environment variables
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15617](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15617). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A number of environment variables can be used to influence how Arrow C++ runs. We should create a dedicated documentation page listing them.

Note that Sphinx has a dedicated directive:
https://www.sphinx-doc.org/en/master/usage/restructuredtext/domains.html#directive-envvar
